mapper.select: SELECT mhr.id, mhr.`position`, mhr.years, mhr.`job_requirements` jobRequirements, mhr.`post_duties` postDuties, mh.`name` hospitalName, mh.id hospitalId FROM medical_hospital_recruit mhr LEFT JOIN `medical_hospital` mh ON mhr.`hospital_id` = mh.`id` WHERE mhr.deleted = 0 AND mhr.`status`=1 AND mh.`deleted` = 0 AND mh.`status` = 1 ORDER BY mhr.create_time DESC LIMIT 0, 7

SELECT mhr.id,mhr.`position`, mhr.years, mhr.`job_requirements` jobRequirements, mhr.`post_duties` postDuties FROM medical_hospital_recruit mhr WHERE mhr.deleted = 0 AND mhr.`status`=1 AND mhr.hospital_id = #{hospitalId} ORDER BY mhr.`sort` DESC
